title: The Jewels of Night: A Deryk Wayd Science Fiction Adventure Novel
description: Action science fiction adventure at its best.  An inter-galactic romp through danger after deadly danger. Deryk Wayd must save the world. Nothing new in that. That was his job. But this time, he doesnâ€™t know who or what the threat is. A dead man on the doorstep of his Agency saying that there is a threat is his only clue. Against all odds, he and his team must find the threat, if one even exists, and save the world once again before everything goes wrong. And one beautiful woman on a distant world may hold the key.  Or is it Deryk Wayd, himself, that holds the key? If you like a hopeful future for Mankind, breakneck pacing, extreme adventure, strong formidable characters and nonstop, edge of your seat action, then you will love The Jewels of Night.    " From dense tropical jungles to the dark void of deep space, this is one thrilling adventure you will have a hard time putting down." - Mark Prochaska
author: Kenneth C. Clark
